title: Flashlight
description:
It quickly and easily turns on the flashlight next to the rear camera.

Features:
1. Flashlight in Dark
2. Color Screen Flashlight
3. Morse Code Flashlight for SOS
4. Compass & Map

With this app, you can do : 
+ Find Your Keys in the Dark 
+ Read a Real Book at Night 
+ Light the Way When Camping and Hiking 
+ Make Yourself Visible on Roadside at Night 
+ Light Your Room During a Power Outage 
+ Repair Your Car or Change a Puppets 
+ Check on the Little Ones

It's hard to beat the super bright LED flashlight on Android when it comes to simplicity. The flashlight app's setup mimics an actual hardware flashlight, with an on and off switch you can toggle to turn on and off your digital torch light.

You can also adjust the light's strobe or blinking mode by swiping left or right on the digital flashlight's bezel. If it's a free and simple flashlight app you're after and you use a smartphone running Android, this should be one of the first downloads you check out.

You'll find the basic torch functionality with this torch light app, but it also offers some more "fun" features. Apart from that most basic torch functionality, you can even use the torch light to send Morse code.

title: Impossible Tracks Car Stunt : Road Climb 4X4
description:
A brand new game from the developers, this time its Impossible Tracks Car Stunt. You have the complete control of the vehicle while driving on the roads. Roads are not just roads, there are lots of twists and turns. Stunts, becoming increasingly difficult and more fun, have duration times specially determined. If you want to play again the parts that you could not complete with 3 stars, you can play with the, meaning your own score, and get ahead of it. Remember! In the level, if you complete with 3 stars, you win 2 times more prizes that the ones you win normally. With the prize money you win, you can buy new cars, customize your cars. Drive Big SUVs,extreme sports cars and luxury sedans. Complete impossible track stunts challenges on the most dangerous roads.



HOW TO PLAY?

- Please choose the most appropriate method to control the car. You can select a best driving type fit for you or adjust your device sensor in the Settings section. Do not forget to adjust the steering sensitivity, if you have difficulty to control the steering.

- Try to buy upgrades, if your car cannot overcome the obstacles or is not fast enough. If the updates are not enough, you need to buy a new car.

- If you run out of your coins, you can earn coins by tapping ‚Äúwatch video, win coins‚Äù button or replaying the stages that you have already played.

- Try to develop different methods while trying to overcome obstacles, because cars move according to the law of physics. Don‚Äôt expect to get different results by trying the same method over and over again.

FEATURES :

- An environment where the physics laws completely prevail! Cars go wherever you want them to go, and do whatever you want them to do.

- 30+ different models of cars,which have technical and hardware specifications different from each other.

- Exclusive Cars added

- Day and night mode.

- Modify some specifications of cars such as handling, motor and brake,

- Chance of changing the color, rim and appearance of cars

- High-quality and ever-changing environment models.

- Addictive episodes that are not boring at all

- Different actions that come with new episodes

- New tracks in every 10 days.

Challenge your friends for the impossible track stunts. 

DOWNLOAD NOW

title: Real Guitar Free - Chords, Tabs & Simulator Games
description:
üé∏ Real Guitar Free is a simulator app featuring electric and acoustic guitar sounds recorded with live guitars! Learn how to play the guitar with free chords and tabs that we have in stock for you! The app has dozens of useful options and playing modes and is a perfect fit for both beginners and mastered guitarists.

Are you looking for a temporary music instrument substitution or want to learn and revise chords? Do you want to jam to a song that you like or maybe you need tabs of popular songs? Playing music simulator games is the way you spend your free time? All you need is Real Guitar. You can strum, pluck and strike virtual strings playing chords, riffs and even solo of any complexity.

High-quality sounds that are recorded professionally using genuine musical instruments give you the possibility to play without using the amp. The simulator has a user-friendly interface that lets you make music and songs as easy as never before. 

Moreover, It‚Äôs a great tool to learn guitar for beginners and an amazing free game for kids. Millions of musicians around the world are fond of it for different reasons. 

Here‚Äôs what you get with our app:

‚òÖ Various types of guitar and music instruments:
- Acoustic
- Electric
- Classic
- 12 String

‚òÖ Awesome playing options:
- Solo mode to make beautiful solos (all music notes are animated)
- Chord mode to practice strumming
- Hand switcher for both right handed and left handed guitarists
- Nylon and steel strings
- Various strumming patterns

‚òÖ Chords and guitar tabs:
- Complete chord library book with the playback function
- Chord Finder helps you quickly find chords on the fingerboard and learn scales on the fretboard (useful when practicing guitar lessons)
- Songbook with notes and chords (lyrics are coming soon)


The app is a great tool that can be used to:
- Beginners
- Teach kids how to play
- Make your lessons more fun
- Travel and practice on the go
- Learn new chords, songs, tunes, riffs and solos
- Get to know basics of the bass

Tips from Gismart:
- You should definitely use the app to jam to songs when you travel and are away from your musical instrument. Everyday practicing helps improve sense of tempo and rhythm and is definitely a way to success 
- It‚Äôs a must-have tool for beginners as well as for rock band guitarists and game admirers. 
- To learn scales is a great way of exploring the fingerboard (fretboard) and improving your solo and chord performances.
- Never use poor quality apps! There are tons of virtual simulators out there, but only few with high quality guitar sounds made with live instruments and by professional musicians. We‚Äôre at Gismart really care about quality.

Whether you‚Äôre striving to become the next rock guitarist or simply looking for free games to pass time with music, Real Guitar will provide you and your friends with a lot of fun! ...Oh, and did we mention there‚Äôs no need to change strings? )üé∏

comments: Scam, do not bother. Forces you to subscribe for almost 10 dollars - a month (!!!) before you even get to play, and then it is *still* choke-full of ads on every corner. The game itself is functional and has a few songs to play, but there is 500 others like that on the market that don't behave like scams. Oh by the way uninstalling will not unsubscribe you, you have to go to the play store->hamburger menu->subscriptions. Yes I know the first three days are free. It is still a joke.

I can't play.When I start the app, it shows me a way to continue and be a member(common)I click on the "x" and then another page appears wich allows me to pay for the membership I look and wait for an "x" I see none I can't do anything except pay wich I will NEVER do.I am really disappointed in this app I thought it would be fun but turns out it's just another stupid scam.DO NOT INSTALL.

This is a horrendous app!! Won't allow you to even play, without paying 70 for a 1 year subscription. There is no way to exit, no X or option to use limited features. Total scam. Don't waste your time. Developers, you need to fix this issue!! Or delete the app!! Calling you out...

At first when I saw the reviews I thought they we're lying. But once I installed it, is said Free Trial 67.98/month! Please fix your game developers. And also warning for the people that want to install it. *SCAM ALERT! DO NOT BUY!*

***SCAM ALERT*** The app is a scam,It will not continue until you subscribe to its annual subscription which is about $50 US, This app shouldn't be on the app store. Its something different to give a trial version, but not letting you continue without subscription, thats some next level scam. Let the user decide if they want all the features.

title: Flo Health & Period tracker. My Ovulation Calendar
description:
Over 130 million women around the globe have already chosen Flo as their menstrual calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy assistant!

Flo is a smart and simple feminine menstrual cycle calendar and  PMS symptom tracker, accurate ovulation calculator and helpful pregnancy tracker. The app Flo Period Tracker not only  accurately tracks your cycle and flow intensity,  but is also a sensitive regular and irregular period tracker, reliable trying to conceive app, ovulation calendar, and true fertility friend for you. Flo period diary makes accurate predictions of menstruation, ovulation and fertile days. It‚Äôs the first free period tracking app for Android, pregnancy calculator, fertility calendar, ovulation calendar for wom–µn that uses machine learning (AI). All women, even those with irregular period, can rely on this health tracker. Log your menstruation days & flow intensity in a handy period calendar (menstrual cycle diary), ovulation tracker and fertility calculator, schedule menstrual cycle reminders, record moods and PMS symptoms, use a due date calculator, follow a pregnancy calendar and take full control of your health with the app.
Want to know when your next period is coming? Confused by PMS symptoms? Want to take your birth control pills in time? With this free female period tracker, ovulation calculator and fertility calendar it‚Äôs easy to keep track of your menstrual cycle.

FREE PERIOD DIARY & OVULATION CALENDAR & FERTILITY CALENDAR (CALCULATOR) FOR WOMEN AND TEENS
Download this period and ovulation tracking app and:
‚Ä¢ Track your cycle, period days and PMS with the period calendar for Android
‚Ä¢ Log the start and the end date of menstruation, flow intensity and fertile days in the period calendar
‚Ä¢ Track your fertility window (fertile days) and when do you ovulate to see your chance to get pregnant with the ovulation predictor
‚Ä¢ Analyze your current and past cycles, menstrual flow with the menstrual tracker
‚Ä¢ Get predictions for upcoming periods, ovulation days, and fertility with the period calendar
‚Ä¢ Log ovulation tests results (positive ovulation, negative ovulation) in the app for Android
‚Ä¢ Track basal temperature with the period calendar
‚Ä¢ Log pregnancy tests results in the app for Android
‚Ä¢ Log more symptoms to get improved period predictions if you have irregular periods

PREGNANCY CALCULATOR (PREGNANCY CALENDAR) & TRACKER
‚Ä¢ See countdown to the birth of the baby
‚Ä¢ Track the week of pregnancy
‚Ä¢ Pick and change your pregnancy week by week
‚Ä¢ Get interesting articles on pregnancy every day

LIFESTYLE & FITNESS TRACKER
‚Ä¢ Add your weight, water consumption every day
‚Ä¢ Log your physical activity every day in the app for Android
‚Ä¢ Track your sex drive and moods every day
‚Ä¢ Log your PMS symptoms in the period calendar app

REMINDERS
‚Ä¢ Schedule reminders and get notifications of your period, ovulation days and fertility
‚Ä¢ Get reminders to log weight, sleep and to drink water every day
‚Ä¢ Get reminders on medication and contraception depending on your contraception type

GRAPHS
‚Ä¢ Keep your period, menstrual flow, ovulation, fertility and symptoms history
‚Ä¢ Analyze your cycle and period duration with the menstrual cycle diary
‚Ä¢ See the graph of your BBT and ovulation days
‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight changes and activity during the cycle with the menstrual cycle diary
‚Ä¢ Track your sleep duration and sleep debt every day
‚Ä¢ Control the amount of water consumed every day

MEDICAL AND SCIENTIFIC KNOWLEDGE 
‚Ä¢ Find out more about your body, cycle, ovulation, fertility and menstrual flow with the app Flo Period Tracker
‚Ä¢ Get support from the amazing Flo Period Tracker, Ovulation and Fertility Calendar community

Download this period diary for Android and join millions of women and teens who trust their cycles to this Period Tracker & Ovulation Tracker & Fertility Calendar.

CONNECT WITH THE APP FLO PERIOD TRACKER, OVULATION & FERTILITY CALENDAR
support@flo.health

recentChanges:
Discover our biggest update ever ‚Äî Flo 5.0.
Take your health and well-being to the next level with the app used by 140 million women.
Explore more accurate AI-based cycle predictions and a daily well-being plan that includes tailored, practical health insights with cycle- and hormone-based tips for clearer skin, better workouts, and more energy. Explore a new health library co-created with 50+ leading doctors and health experts.

comments: I used to love this app. It helped me get diagnosed with Endo after I read one of the helpful articles on irregular periods. Unfortunately, everything has been locked behind their premium membership paywall. All the helpful articles are gone, replaced only with endless prompts to buy their memberships. And so, I too must move on. I understand the need to make money, but for those of us who can't afford it, its merely the nail in the coffin.

I've been able to track my period, ovulation, and even my pregnancy...very useful app! Update: I still love the app and its content. However, it has been difficult trying to change my pregnancy info. I had to uninstall and reinstall the app and there were still some issues as the app tends to save prerecorded data. Also, I would love it if I could log personal notes and reminders. This can be done somewhat using the calender feature but only after that specific date has come or passed.

I've been using this app for over 2 years now and it was great back then. Ever since they upgraded and got premium the user experience has gone down so much. I just like to log and track things and it used to be so quick and easy but every 5 seconds now you get prompted with an 'upgrade to premium' 'look at this premium feature' to the point where it takes so long to just try to mark one thing. You have great content, but when I hit X on something I expect it to close and not keep popping up

Used to really like this app. All of the information was great! Now unfortunately you don't get anything but the tracker unless you pay. I am already paying through the nose for doctors visits and tests to try to get pregnant and unfortunately this just isn't an expense I can justify. I understand the "subscription" income is used to "improve" the app but I feel that myself and a few others would be happier to watch a few adds and still have access. The tracker is accurate most of the time.

ETA: I don't know how others are able to get an option to log menstrual cup use. I've been using it for months and haven't seen that. It's pretty disappointing I have been using My Calendar for a good few years, and it's alright. Flo is great. I love all the information available and actually enjoy the "chats" to learn more about my cycle and my body. I also love how pretty it is, lol. I will definitely recommend it to friends.

title: Injustice: Gods Among Us
description:
Build an epic roster of DC super heroes and villains and get ready for battle! INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is a free-to-play collectible card game where you build a roster of characters, moves, powers, and gear and enter the arena in touch-based 3-on-3 action combat.

FIGHT
Use the touch screen mechanics of your mobile device to battle your enemies in 3-on-3 action combat. Swipe and tap to perform combos and build your power to pull off special attacks and super moves taken straight from the console version of the game.

LEVEL UP
Build your move set, increase your powers, upgrade your characters and gear, and beat your competition. Constantly evolve your card collection to fit your style of play and put your best team forward as you take on a series of DC super hero and villian combatants.z

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Take on real opponents in Online Multiplayer Battles. Compete against players worldwide on the leaderboards, and in tournaments filled with awesome rewards. Watch replays of your previous offensive and defensive battles to hone your skills and your team lineup. Lead your team to victory!

MASSIVE ROSTER
Collect and play as your favorite DC Comics icons: Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, The Joker, Green Arrow, Flash, Bane, Green Lantern, Doomsday, and many others. With each alternate version of these iconic characters you get a new set of powers and moves, and a whole new fight!

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Delivers best-in-class graphics on your phone or tablet, with custom animations for every single super hero and villain. Take the battle to Arkham Asylum, the Batcave, The Watchtower, and other iconic locales from DC Comics, fully rendered in 3D.


Please Note: INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

comments: It's a great app, it doesn't take that long to master, the community is great (especially on the reddit, it's full of players helping eachother), and when you're ready to tackle the weekly challenge, you get a great free character! I've been playing since about late July, and I already have about 6-7 gold characters, the majority I got for free! Also, the MP mode is a little off-balance, since the Nth Metal characters screw it over, but it's still just an incredibly fun game.

In my oppinion, this is by far one of the best free to play mobile games of all time. Game was highly unstable when I picked it up, patches have greatly improved performance and crashes are rare now. There is an offline mode, survival mode, and online battle mode, in addition to the relatively new "breakthrough" and "phantomzone" modes for increased unlock potential. Also, did I mention there are zero ads??!! I do think the new Nth metal heroes are slightly overpowered, and expensive to level.

A simplified version of the console game. Fighting animations are smooth (compared to the second one). It might be just my phone but there is something robotic and off with the injustice 2 mobile fighting animations that doesnt feel normal compared to this one. Gameplay is simple.You get to play, collect and level up your favorite DC characters on the go. Having this game available offline is very convenient too. Granting easy access so that you can continue grinding even without wifi.

This game is awsome the fighting is simple and easy to understand and the range of characters and their depictions are super cool. The only thing that would make it better is if they had updated the graphics and save system instead of making a whole new game that is not as fun in my opinion because of the massive amount of commands you have to memorize inorder to fight.

Good game, only problem is the survival rules regarding changing characters. How is putting a character in and subbing them out to maybe use later regarded as an elimination, huh. I lost 20K coins and some other stuff, all because I mistakenly put a character I didn't want to put at the time and confirmed before going back to change it. When I finally lost, I was banking on using it to clear round 9 before cashing out. Alas dumb rules cost me. MXM what a stupid rule, seriously.

title: LG Health
description:
LG Health tracks your activity levels and provides an interface and related content based on that information, so all types of users can customize the app to fit their own activity levels. 

Beginner
You can see beginner exercise info when exercise is not part of your daily routine. The exercise circle shows the progress to your goal over 24 hours. Tap the circle to see the type of exercises you have done.	

Advanced
You can see advanced exercise info when exercise is part of your daily routine. The exercise circle shows the progress to your goal over 24 hours by type and intensity. Tap the circle to see your weekly exercise trends in a graph. You can also add logs manually.	

Tips‚Ä®
You can see personalized tips above the exercise circle. Tips are shown according to your lifestyle and exercise patterns.

Accessory
Manage your fitness activities, track your weight and monitor your diet using LG Smart Watch and Tone Active.

Conditions
The App supports all LG smartphones and includes Non-LG Android smartphones as well.
Tablets and some mobile devices may not be supported. Some functions may not be available based on regions/service providers/devices. LG Health requires Android OS 4.4 or above. Please note that LG Health is intended for fitness and wellness purposes only and is not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease.

summary: You can see your daily exercise info with tips and challenges.
recentChanges:
* From the Android 10, need to update and re-login for LG Health service(Ranking and sync).
* According to Google policies, From the Oreo OS(Android 8.0), LG Health app alerts are always displayed in the notification window.
You can setting app notifications by touching and holding the notification.
Turning off notifications may limit some features.
* Activity recognition of cycling and climbing stairs are no longer supported.
* Does not support login with Amazon account.
comments: This is an applicable widget, but I found a shortage on it. For example, during daily activity, while I'm in the car, the widget is still counting my steps, while I'm not walking. So I suggest you to put some useful keys on the widget i.e. play/pause/stop, in order to use this application just during exercise or at the time that we need do some activites.

The app needs to allow for the customer to be able to add the information on the types of exercises even if it the day after. This app does not allow to add information if you forgot to do it on the specific day. Also is too light. They need to af more features.
Very accurate step count. Within 25 inches. Lousy complicatef UI.

You should be able to choose whether or not you want to have this app on you phone. There should be a sign in option as well. If you want to erase the data you've entered that should be an option as well. Nowadays people are using their smartwatches to track their fitness. Stop prompting me to update an app I don't want to use, it's taking up space.

Please increase the font size and contrast of info on the widget. There is plenty of room for a larger font. The white letters against the gray background make it even harder to read. Also the number of steps is unreadable in both colors because of the font and the bright colors. Thank you.

title: AT&T Secure Family‚Ñ¢
description:
Peace of Mind Just Got A Lot Easier

As seen on Good Morning America, AT&T Secure Family‚Ñ¢ puts parents in control of their children‚Äôs phone use.  Find your family, control your child‚Äôs screen time and manage their phone use.

Features
*	Locate Family -Track your child on demand or on a regular schedule, for example every day after school
*	Location Alerts - Receive alerts when your child enters or leaves a location, like school or practice. 
*	Location History - Review where your child has been over the previous seven days.
*	Limit Screen Time - Block your child‚Äôs mobile data and Wi-Fi, on demand or on a schedule you choose.
*	Content Filters ‚Äì Block inappropriate Apps and websites by age or customize your own settings.

AT&T Secure Family is free for the first 30 days. After the first 30 days, you will be billed $7.99 each month (includes support for up to 10 lines.)  Service auto renews every 30 days unless cancelled.

AT&T Secure Family Companion App

AT&T Secure Family is designed to work with AT&T Secure Family Companion, a free app in the Google Play Store.  Download it to your child‚Äôs phone and pair it with your phone to get all the features.

AT&T Wireless customers ‚Äì pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion is recommended to get all the features of Secure Family.  If you do not pair a device, features are limited to AT&T network-based location, scheduled location alerts and location history.
   
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers and customers on other wireless carriers ‚Äì pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion on the child device is required to use any of the Secure Family features.
Other important information about AT&T Secure Family:

AT&T Postpaid Wireless customers billed by AT&T:
  -   View, modify or cancel anytime within the app.  
  -   Secure Family and Companion app users must be on the same account.  Only authorized app users have permission to locate a family member.
  -   There is a compatibility conflict that can prevent the addition of AT&T Secure Family Companion to your companion device if you have AT&T Mobile Security Plus running on the same companion device.  If you wish to continue with the purchase, you must either remove AT&T Mobile Security Plus from your account or downgrade to AT&T Mobile Security Basic on the companion device before adding AT&T Secure Family Companion. 
  
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers, and customers of other US Wireless carriers billed by Google Play Store:
  -   After first 30 days, $7.99/mo. will be charged to your Google Play account.  Subscription will automatically renew each month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current month‚Äôs billing period.
  -   To view, modify or cancel your subscription, go to account settings in Google Play Store.  No cancellation of the current month‚Äôs subscription is allowed.  No refunds or credits for partial subscription terms. 

General:
  -   Devices running the Secure Family App or Secure Family Companion App require Android v. 5.0 or higher.
  -   Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically reduce battery life.
  -   Availability, timeliness or accuracy of location is not guaranteed. Coverage not available in all areas. The collection, use, and disclosure of any personal information through this application is governed by AT&T's Privacy Policy found at: att.com/privacypolicy. View the AT&T Secure Family website at att.com/securefamily

recentChanges: Release includes bug fixes plus improved pairing between the parent and child phones for those using the App for location tracking only.  A VPN will not be installed for location tracking alone.  VPN will be required for parental controls features such as pause internet or content filtering.  Includes icons on the Map indicating use of cell towers for network location (lower accuracy) or GPS (higher accuracy).  We continue to listen to our valued customers and work to improve your experience.
comments: Quality just keeps going downhill. Seems like bugs get bigger with each update. Lately, when trying to locate another phone on our plan, it can only tell me the county that the phone is in - which is absolutely useless information. Other times, it can't locate the phone at all. AT&T....if you want people to pay for this app, then you need to get it together.

9/25/2020 Has been much more stable. 7/1/2019 I don't get it, I have many apps but this is the only one that regularly has problems. 11/14/2018 What idiot would discontinue an app that was working perfectly fine before the replacement app was ready? Someone at AT&T is really lacking. Update: And the comedy continues! The new replacement app, "Secure Family", is finally here. Location improvements? Can't even locate anyone at all in my family. Now let's see how long it takes AT&T to fix it.

App wont open, keep getting notifications saying the app is updating...been doing this for 3 days..why is it updating for 3 days....not able to use it at all. This type of problem happens all the time, in the past I have had the problem of it opening and then it immediately closes. Even uninstalling and reinstalling does not help. So frustration.

I keep having the app pause and freeze. It states update and freezes. Everytime it updates that happens and it seems to update often like often. I also placed 3 phones on gps and connected their phones for some reason one phone says it is no longer connected since the update and I dont have phone to fix this error but I need this program because the people that have these phones need to be found if they are lost. And I depend on this app to help do that. That's why I have every 1 hr schelduled

This app is terrible. Att Smart Limits was a much better app. Each time I unpause my sons internet access, he has to restart his phone for it allow him internet. Also the GPS is not accurate. His phone was turned on at 9am and at 1pm I get a notification he arrived at school when he had been there all day. You cannot block specific phone numbers like you could in Smart Limits.

title: metroZONE
description:
What if every phone unlock made your day just a little better? Imagine unlocking in the morning, and the weather is already there.

Imagine unlocking while you‚Äôre waiting in line or at work, and there‚Äôs already a beautiful photo gallery waiting to help you relax and escape the grind. Or maybe, for you, it‚Äôll be local events that‚Äôll make you look forward to your downtime, or just the top headlines in news, sports or entertainment to stay informed.

comments: Every so often, when metro zone pops up on my cellphone screen, I would take a few minutes to read about what is taken place in my neighborhood and community. I find metro zone to be very informative, and straightforward in delivering the news.
I am very satisfied with my T-Mobile service and I love the metroZone news feed, along with countless other personalized features that comes along with the service.
Great Information I find helpful a lot of the time, As well as many games to play for free. I enjoy it.
metro zone keeps me up to date with all latest news. I like the option where you can filter what news is for me.
Always gives me a broad range of subjects and articles to look into and even some I wouldn't normally look for myself. I love the fortune cookie and horoscope as well.

title: WildCraft: Animal Sim Online 3D
description:
Explore nature as a wild animal and raise a family in the wilderness in Wildcraft, a new RPG adventure set in a huge 3D landscape!

Start your adventure as a wolf, fox, lynx and more, and take your family on a new adventure. Play with friends in multiplayer games and form animal families to protect your cubs from enemies. Unlock new animal breeds as your family legacy grows in Wildcraft!

WILDCRAFT FEATURES:

Choose Animal Breeds
- Start your adventure as a:
- Wolf
- Fox
- Lynx
- And more!

Raise a Family
- Animal simulator: Customize each family member by name, gender, fur color, bark, eyes, body size, and more!
- Raise a family: Have up to six cubs per family and continue your legacy.
- Animal simulator lets you leave your current family to start a new one.

Explore a 3D World
- Explore the world and travel to unique locations.
- Adventure the wild and survive the elements in summer, winter, spring and fall.

Battle Enemies
- Battle dangerous enemies as a wild animal and protect your family.
- Unlock fighting achievements after defeating specific enemies.

Online Adventure Games
- Play with friends, explore the world and battle enemies.
- Battle enemies with friends to effectively protect your family.

Raise a family as one of your favorite wild animals and explore a huge 3D world. Join friends to battle more enemies, or take them on alone to make your adventure more challenging in Wildcraft.

Download today to play as a wolf, fox, lynx and more!

recentChanges:
New playable animal - Tiger! And a new location - Jungles - with amazing flora and fauna! Also, a new jungle den.
Legendary skins and action for rhino and parrot transformation.
New rare skins for all transformations.
More of den items in a jungle style.
WildClub: cheetah's and tiger's skins, pet rhino, new accessories for wolf, fox, and lynx.
comments: I love this game so much! I only had it for a week and its already my favorite. I have a couple of things that could be fixed though. Usually when I get a friend and I check my friends list they are not there which can be annoying. Sometimes when you try to load into a multiplayer game the map randomly isn¬¥t downlaoded and it kicks you out of the game which is annoying too. It would be really cool if there was a friend and clan chat when your not in game. But overall this is amazing. 5 stars.

Very amazing game. This game is very simple. You basically hunt animals and eat them to level up (if your sensitive to blood there's none in this game). You can even raise a cute family! [Maximum family members is 6). You can also change your animal, and it won't loose your progress! You can change it to a fox, bear, cheetah, crocodile, etc! HAPPY HALLOWEEN üéÉ!

I love this game but could you help me get on multiplayer because when I go on multiplayer it kicks me out and says Error connection to server timed out and that happened for 2 years! And it happened for no reason. I could not fix it! And it's still happening! Has that ever happened to you? And when 1 day passes I can go on multiplayer but if I exit and try going back it does the same as I told you at the second sentence.

It's hard to control the eagle with flying, otherwise the controls are pretty darn good. Though I do know my phone is somewhat small and it's hard to simulate flight. I do think they should (if possible) add more plant variation like with bushes in certain maps. Maybe an aquatic update too? As someone who used to play when there was 3 play able animals, it's awesome to see this game grow! Sorry if I set my expectations too high or low, I just want to see the game improve for everyone.

I love it, it is such a great game I have so much playing with outher players and by my self. But, there is some lag if you go on top of the land a little bit behind the poltel you can go throught that bit of land, be stuck there and have to tellport to your den. Beside that it is a great game. (In the clacis one.)

title: Skillful Finger
description:
Touch your finger at the point on the screen and slide on the line which is shown randomly without taking your finger back. The only work you need to do is to pass the barriers and keep away from the sides. That is an endless game with dozens of barriers! You can create the ball and tail combination of your choice. You'll never be bored. You can either compare your score with your friends or with other global players by Google Play Games compliance or you can make targets to reach.

comments: Fantastic and very much complicated game! It really has sharpen my finger reflexes. Its reaaly good game for passing time. Amazing!!
This app does sharpen my reflexes and I think it makes me more observant. I also learn to let go of some coins. You can't always have it all. It sure is a good use of my time.
Nice game .. and very nice levels .. each level has different content .. but the problem is that there are toooooo many ads .. that is the reason for giving 3 stars ..
Sometimes it makes you frustrated but its still a fun game
This game is sick!!!!!!!! Download it now. Suddenly lockdown ain't boring

title: Evil Nun : Scary Horror Game Adventure
description:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ More than 20 million players‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Say hello to mystery and survival in a school garded by a scary evil nun that can hear any noise (be careful!). Evil nun seems to be a mix between a granny and...a ghost, a victim of a zombie plague or any other dead soul. Horror and death are after you, evil nun will kill you if she finds you and the adventure escape will have finished . Hide anywhere !! Inside or out the school ...farm or parking area can be good hiding places !

Bendy weapons are useful to complete puzzles, like a chewing gum gun or an explosive doll with which you will be able to make things explode. Dead nun wants to kill you , so  solve puzzles , run away of death and save your soul !

Feeling alone ? Not in that adventure escape and survival game. Apart from scary granny nun, there is also some neighbor... Laundry room hides a mystery: why are there children ? Are they alive or dead ? It's clear that they couldn't leave this scary school . But rescue them and become a hero is possible! How to rescue other children locked by granny ? Pay attention to secret puzzles that will appear in this horror game , hide and run, that's the key for survival !

Today is not Halloween 's day, but if you have ever beat a zombie plague or others creatures of Halloween, say hello to dead nun and show us your skills in this adventure escape horror game .

- It includes a " ghost mode " in case that your neighbor can't put up with your screams for fear. Hours and hours of fun and horror guaranteed to be a true hero, beat granny evil nun, rescue children and complete whole game !

- Our horror game is still in development ... do you have an amazing idea ? Want more puzzles ? We're bendy and opened to new ideas !

Enjoy & run! Survival is about to start...

Bendy weapons are useful to complete puzzles, like a chewing gum gun or an explosive doll with which you will be able to make things explode. Dead nun wants to kill you , so solve puzzles , run away of death and save your soul !

Feeling alone ? Not in that adventure escape and survival game. Apart from scary granny nun, there is also some neighbor... Laundry room hides a mystery: why are there children ? Are they alive or dead ? It's clear that they couldn't leave this scary school . But rescue them and become a hero is possible! How to rescue other children locked by granny ? Pay attention to secret puzzles that will appear in this horror game , hide and run, that's the key for survival !

Today is not Halloween 's day, but if you have ever beat a zombie plague or others creatures of Halloween, say hello to dead nun and show us your skills in this adventure escape horror game .

- It includes a " ghost mode " in case that your neighbor can't put up with your screams for fear. Hours and hours of fun and horror guaranteed to be a true hero, beat granny evil nun, rescue children and complete whole game !

- Our horror game is still in development ... do you have an amazing idea ? Want more puzzles ? We're bendy and opened to new ideas !

Enjoy & run! Survival is about to start...
summary: Solve puzzles & escape from granny evil nun in this adventure escape game!

Glitch the game: play in laptop go to watch a video of how to glitch the game of red ball 1234 then bingo done.

Its amazing, it had good gameplay, good looks and its very challenging, fun game, it gets a 5/5 tho i got an idea, in the underground/cave levels there should be shards with random colors, when your underneath them they shake for 1 second then fall, there will be 3 colors, green with a speed od 0.3 pink with a speed of 0.9 and yellow with a speed of 3, and can you add a level maker? That would be so cool!

After having the free version of this game for quite a while, my son asked me to put down the massive $1.99 for the Android TV version of this game so he didn't have to wait to unlock lives. On the NVidia Shield w/ controller, this game is a blast for him. The paid version unlocked tons of fun worlds and levels. It's fun simple game play that reminded me a bit of Mario Brothers to be honest. Simple game play but still fun enough for both of us to enjoy. GREAT for kids!

It is crazy how bad the controls are. I have lost all of my lives (all 5) on one part of one level in the first set of 15 because the controls won't respond to me and I am constantly falling off because I have too much speed for the controls to be able to stop after they finally wake up and realize that there is an input. The controls feel harder to use than how hard it is to herd cats.

Very good game and it is also good for children and elders.......my daughter loves this game and when she feel tired or when she is bored she plays the game and she is very happy....one thing she doesn't like and that is the life issue because there are only five life's so when the hard level come and there were no life's she feel very sad.....now she is in 54 level ( fourth episode ) and her age is 11.......so i request to fix these issue and also if total 5 life's then reduce the timing.....

title: Toca Kitchen
description:
Do you want to be the head chef of your very own sushi restaurant? Check out Toca Kitchen Sushi, the newest app from Toca Boca üëâ http://bit.ly/TocaKitchenSushi_GooglePlay

Ever wanted to play with your food? Now you can! Toca Boca brings you Toca Kitchen, where you cook, play with and prepare food for four hungry characters. Pick any ingredient and prepare it in your own way. Slice, boil, fry, cook, microwave or mix! Then wait for your hungry friend‚Äôs response.

We created this educational app for kids to give the mud cakes a new face, a complete virtual makeover which the kids will love! The characters fearful reactions to different meals will make you giggle. Does the cat like salty fish? Will the boy eat potatoes and greens? Mix and match your own meal! With no high scores, levels or time limits the fun doesn‚Äôt have to end in this cooking app.  

- Four cute characters to cook for - each with their own favorite food!
- 12 different ingredients that can be prepared in 180 different ways!
- Slice, boil, fry, cook, microwave anything you like! 
- Professional and fun kids app design!
- No rules or high scores!
- Kid-friendly interface
- No in-app purchases
- No third party advertising

What are you waiting for? Let‚Äôs get in the kitchen and start cooking!

Toca Kitchen is a free cooking app for kids that‚Äôs perfect for aspiring chefs. Kids will roleplay a chef in a kitchen, exploring ways to cook tasty and silly foods for hungry customers to eat. This fun cooking app is sure to deliver nothing but creativity and imagination for kids!

As with all Toca Boca apps, there are no high scores, time limits or stressful music. Rest assured this app for kids let‚Äôs kids play however they want!

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids‚Äô imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

title: Hello Stars
description:
Hello Stars is a puzzle video solving game.  It's easy to learn but very diffcult to master.

The job of each level is to guide a ball from a predetermined start point so that it touches all of the stars placed on the level. The ball and nearly all objects on the screen are affected by gravity. The first few levels are almost too easy, but as the difficulty increases you'll be thankful that you were able to practice the fundamentals of draw. As the game progresses, you'll have to use all sorts of theory to figure out a solution for each puzzle. 


The Game Features:
‚òÖ Hundreds of ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚òÖ 220 of physics puzzles, more levels are comming soon!
‚òÖ Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.
‚òÖ Solutions can be found in the end of each level.
‚òÖ Play 100+ of challenging
‚òÖ Interesting physics puzzles, they're not as easy as they look.


We need translations
Please help us translate Hello Stars into your language like Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Russian and other languages.
You can contact us via this email: üìÆcashgamesteam@gmail.comüìÆ. Thanks for your effort to help us.

Feel free to contact us by cashgamesteam@gmail.com if you have any problem about Hello Stars.

comments: Fun Game, Too Many Ads. Finished a level? Watch an ad. Don't want an ad? Here's one anyway. Here's another ad, I didn't skip the last one fast enough. Way too much. I timed it and for every 2 minutes of actual gameplay, I had 3 minutes 48 seconds of total ads

It is really good in terms of the difficulty and the different gamemodes and I have to say that the sound and music is really good. There maybe too many ads but the is a cross button to click it away so not really a problem and I like the tutorial level as it is animated.

Annoying the app continues to show notifications even after they have been turned off, They just use a different push notification. I have had 6 notifications in 15 mins and I have now removed the app.

This game is fine in concept, unfortunately, it doesn't work in practice. A lot of puzzles require precise solutions, if you have big fingers, you've already lost. If you touch a wall, a simple solution would be to have the line skip over the wall, instead, you have to backtrack your fingere to draw it at a new angle. Not very practical, developers. This game was not made with the intention of satisfaction.

It's really unfortunate, because this game is kinda like Crayon Physics Deluxe, which I own but won't work. However, there's an ad after almost every quick puzzle, and you can't skip until the whole ad has played. Couple this with the fact that you can't simply pay to remove ads, but must purchase a subscription that's around 12 dollars a month. That's a little past insane.

title: Fing - Network Tools
description:
Fing has helped 35 million user worldwide to understand:
‚Ä¢ Who's on my WiFi
‚Ä¢ Is someone stealing my WiFi and broadband?
‚Ä¢ Have I've been hacked? Is my network secure?
‚Ä¢ Are there hidden cameras in the B&B I'm staying in?
‚Ä¢ Why Netflix has started buffering?
‚Ä¢ Is my internet provider giving me the speed I pay for?
 
Fing is the #1 Network Scanner: discovers all the devices connected to your WiFi and identifies them, with our patented technology used also by router manufacturers and antivirus companies worldwide.
 
With Fing App‚Äôs free tools and utilities help you:
‚Ä¢ Run WiFi and Cellular internet speed tests, download speed and upload speed analysis and latency
‚Ä¢ Scan networks with Fing‚Äôs Wi-Fi & LAN network scanner and discover all devices connected to any network
‚Ä¢ Get the most accurate device recognition of IP address, MAC address, device name, model, vendor and manufacturer
‚Ä¢ Advanced device analysis of NetBIOS, UPnP,  SNMP and Bonjour names, properties and device types
‚Ä¢ Includes port scanning, device ping, traceroute and DNS lookup
‚Ä¢ Receive network security and device alerts to your phone and email
 
Add Fingbox to unlock advanced network protection and smart home troubleshooting features:
‚Ä¢ Know who‚Äôs home while you‚Äôre not there with Digital Presence
‚Ä¢ See devices near your home with Digital Fence
‚Ä¢ Block intruders and unknown devices automatically before they join your network
‚Ä¢ Set parental control features to schedule screen time and pause internet access
‚Ä¢ Analyze bandwidth usage by device
‚Ä¢ Find Wi-Fi sweet spots
‚Ä¢ Automate network speed tests and get reports for benchmarking ISP performance
‚Ä¢ Secure your home network with opened port detection and network vulnerability analysis
 
Have a question? Get in touch at support@fing.com or learn more about Fing App and Fingbox at fing.com.

comments: As an original Kickstart backer in 2017, I have always been pleased with my purchase, until this last update. I can't begin to tell you how upsetting it is to go to your digital fence option to pull up history that's always been there until now. All the sudden, without warning, my history is limited and I'm supposed to pay a premium to access my data that was already there? Shameful..don't let greed get to your head. You'll lose customers. Sure hope this gets enough attention from the community.

They introduced a premium subscription plan. This was not part of the deal. Deal was buy the fing box and you get all the software and features that come with it. Now they are finding ways to nickel and dime us and to keep us as paying customers. Every company does this. Offer an idea, back them up, you pay for the device and then the company now has millions of people with their device in their house. Then comes the hidden repeat business plan. Hate companies like this.

This app used to be clean and simple, but now it gets more and more cluttered with each update. I used to use it exclusively, but now its so cluttered with "features" that it is almost impossible to find the features you need. It's so sad when a good app gets ruined like this, more features does not make an app better!!! It can if it's carefully designed but fing has totally failed in that regard. I have decided to move on and I am now using a different app that's more like Fing used to be.

I've been using the fing app for a long time now and I really love it. I liked it so much that I bought a fingbox when they were still looking for funding on indiegogo. After updating the app today, I am disgusted to see that the developers have the audacity to offer "premium" features for a subscription. This action leaves a bitter taste in my mouth as this is how the developers treat the very people who enabled them to bring the fingbox to the market.

Since Google doesn't provide enough characters for a thorough review of Fing, I'll just WARN anyone considering this app to look elsewhere. If history is any indication of what can be expected, then you need to know that paying a monthly subscription fee won't be any assurance that you'll get what you're paying for very long. And if competent Tech Support is important to you, then you definitely need to look elsewhere, because if you have a legitimate issue they can't fix, you will be ignored!

comments: This is the cutest game I've ever played! I even have the other game: My Talking Angela! Yesterday Angela turned 5 years old on My Talking Angela! I think the same thing will happen on My Talking Tom 2! I love Talking Angela sooooo much! Even though people say there's a man in her eyes, I never ever ever ever ever ever ever ever see the man. Talking Angela is sooooo cute!

So I was playing I noticed a vid that came up on YouTube ig was on the news too so I went to check it out and when I came back at first I didn't believe it then wen I got back I saw that the makeup was off her face and floating in the air. I when back where you download it and then saw the pictures of a man in her eyes. I went to go crash my phone the I heard something in the woods so I looked the doors around my house. Then my sister was asleep and I fall asleep too.

Omg literally I just played this from I year and I was playing and I notice that the app is haunted but I love the cat so what just happened is that I just open the app today and angela eyes were red and It was like someone is there behind her and I just ran that time to show that to my parents and there was no one in the chair but I though that it may be some problem of phone and I told hi angela she told hi I am a devil ,i am a devil,and that time i was very scared and i dont want to keep that

I haven't played this game yet I did this ad before I started and going in the game but I heard it's very creepy and if you zoom into the eye then you can see a manner something then yeah I just look on YouTube and I saw a bunch of pictures I mean and then I see that someone is watching you when you play the game so I'm very scared to start of the game right now so yeah wish me good luck so I won't die okay

I was playing and I noticed that there was something or someone in her eye. I saw some things that looked like an and a couch. I screenshoted the eyes and saw those. I thought it was really creepy. I instantly deleted the game after I discovered the things in the eyes. Kids don't download this game without your parents. I think the person that made the game was the person in the eyes. I rate this 1 star cause I thought it was creepy and uncomfortable having someone just staring at you, thats all

comments: This game is a wonderful offline game. I have no signal at my job. The signal strength literally has the circle with a slash through it and this game is still 100% playable. The controls are easy, you get skins for your weapons, and you can even purchase a battle pass if you want more rewards. The only downside is that they always ask if you want to purchase a certain gun after each game you win, but it's not overwhelmingly annoying. Perfect offline game!

title: Fingerprint Pattern App Lock
description:
Secure your apps with fingerprint, pattern and passcode(PIN code). With the most advanced technology integrated into, your priceless applications will be completely safe. This app offers you with many useful features, decorated by splendid user interface that uses dominant color extracted from application icons. This will surely satisfy your privacy demand on daily use.

App Lock supports three types of locks

‚úî Fingerprint: Use your fingerprint unlock apps (available in devices that support fingerprint scanner like Samsung smartphone, Marshmallow devices, Nougat devices...)
‚úî Pattern: unlock your app with your pattern
‚úî PIN code: use PIN code to unlock apps

Useful functionality

Sound and vibration effects
Beautiful User Interface(using your application dominant colors, extracted by parsing its icons)


Our application locker works as an app protector for any app. Lock apps with pattern, fingerprint or password, from Facebook Messenger to Snapchat to Instagram, Whatapps, to Chrome or any other app! Super simple and fast with password protection our lock app for apps gives you peace of mind and personal security that your information, stored logins and applications are not only securely locked, but also hidden when other people use your phone.

FAQs

=====

Q: How do I change my PIN or Lock Pattern? How do I switch between a PIN and a Pattern?
A: Open App Lock ‚Üí settings ‚Üí Choose PIN code/pattern

Q: Does your locker app work when I restart my phone?
A: Yes, our locker app automatically starts up and protects your locked apps on a phone restart.

Q: Can I unlock my apps again?
A: Yes, you can easily and quickly lock and unlock any app at any time.

Q: How do I enable fingerprint password unlock?
A: If you have a phone with supported hardware like the ones made by Samsung or if they are powered by Android Marshmallow, Nougat... Or if you possessed Nexus devices like Nexus 5x, Nexus 6p, a fingerprint icon will automatically appear under passcode (PIN code) lock screen. Then all you have to do is to touch the fingerprint sensor.

title: Dr.Web Security Space
description:
Complex protection from all kinds of threats for mobile devices, Anti-virus for TV sets, media players, and game consoles based on Android TV.

The product is free for 14 days; after that you need to purchase a commercial license valid for a year or more. 
Use Dr.Web Security Space for Android for free with the purchase of Dr.Web Security Space or Dr.Web Anti-virus for PC/Mac. 


Features and Advantages

‚Ä¢ Quick and full file system scanning; scanning of individual files and folders upon a request.
Real-time scanning of a file system.
Unlocking of data from ransomware Trojans and data safety with no need to pay a ransom to cybercriminals. Even when a phone is fully blocked, even by blockers unknown to the Dr.Web virus databases.
‚Ä¢ Detection of new, unknown malicious programs using the unique Origins Tracing‚Ñ¢ technology. 
‚Ä¢ Moving of detected threats to the quarantine; restoration of files.
Password protection of the Anti-virus settings and access to applications 
Minimal load on the operating system. 
‚Ä¢ Discreet use of battery resources. 
‚Ä¢ Traffic saving due to a small size of the virus database updates.
‚Ä¢ Detailed statistics.
A convenient and informative widget on a device home screen.

URL filter

Restricts access to unwanted Internet resources. 
Blocking of websites that distribute viruses. 
Blocking according to subject categories (drugs, violence, etc.).
White and black lists of websites
Access only to websites from the White list

  Parental Control 

Protects application from an unauthorized access and the Anti-virus settings‚Äîfrom unwanted changes by outsiders and children.

Blocking of access to applications.
Blocking of Dr.Web settings modification.
Password protection  

Security Auditor 

‚Ä¢ Runs diagnostics, exposes security issues and proposes their solutions.

Firewall

Controls network activity of applications.
‚Ä¢ Filtering of external network traffic of applications, that are installed on a device, and system applications‚Äîaccording to a user choice (Wi-Fi, network) and configurable rules (according to IP addresses and/or ports, entire networks, address ranges);
‚Ä¢ Monitoring of current and already transferred traffic‚Äîwith information on addresses/ports connected by applications and on incoming and outgoing traffic;
‚Ä¢ Detailed logs.

Dr.Web Security Space includes only those Dr.Web protection components that comply with Google's policy at any point in time and can be changed by the rights holder to comply with this policy at any point in time, without any obligation to users with regards to changing the components. This set of components is not exhaustive in terms of those the rights holder possesses.  

This app uses the Device Administrator permission.
This app uses Accessibility services.

title: Verizon Cloud
description:
Cloud storage for your mobile devices. Easy to backup, search and share. 

Sign up today for 600 GB or 2 TB of storage and your first 30 days are on us.

Features:  
‚Ä¢	BACK UP your photos, videos, contacts and more to a secure cloud storage
‚Ä¢	SYNC & ACCESS across devices ‚Äì Backup, sync and access your content when you need it, from your smartphone, tablet or computer

‚Ä¢	CREATE MOVIES AND CUSTOMIZE PHOTOS Make masterpieces with music, filters and fun stickers to share

comments: Absolutely no issues to report. MotoZ4, running Android 10. It's a basic app but, that's exactly what you want in cloud storage. Simple and to the point. Transitions are a little slow but, I'm fine with it; this app is doing what it's supposed to üëç. Total app size: 114 MB. No issues with this. Hey people: a 128 GB Samsung EVO memory card is $20 on Amazon. If your phone is "full," clean it out and expand the storage if you can.

So far good. Will need to see down the calendar a ways. 10/30 - still can't access cloud account. 'Sign in and password valid. We can not verify you have a valid account'. (Paraphrasing). When I purchased this tablet, I also purchased a 1TB account. Why can't I get in?

The latest update (10/9/2020) on my Samsung Galaxy J3V is quite a space hog. The amount of space used has gone from around 40 MB to over 400 MB. The creepy part is that it continues to grow with no end in sight like some weird tumor. The growth is classified as data rather than cache. I was told could delete data but it would then have to re sync. It is now the largest app in memory. Asked if I could safely uninstall this update still waiting for an answer. Less than 3 GB left in storage space.

Upload speeds to cloud server are extremely poor (1-5Mbps), files in the Verizon Sync folder fail to upload and will just repeatedly try over and over (which I suspect is the cause of reviews saying this app used up all their data), desktop app is clunky and outdated, can not log into my account via app from a second phone (my work phone), connections to the cloud service often time out. Competing services have never given me any of these issues and are far more price competitive. This service was included in my cell plan but I would rather pay to use a different service than fight to make this one work for free.

Have never even used this app yet since the latest update my phone has completely run out of space. I have deleted hundreds of pictures and videos (DAILY), deleted apps, and am still unable to use literally anything in my phone. Can't so much as make a call or even try to open any app, including cloud, because they close instantly as it still says it's 100% full. Last night I just happened to notice that this app, that has never been used, is now taking up 10gb! That is completely unacceptable.

title: Tarot Card Reading - Love & Future Daily Horoscope
description:
Do you wish to eliminate all your confusions, doubts and uncertainties in life? Tarot Card Reading and Horoscope makes this possible for you through Free Tarot Card Readings!

In Tarot Card Reading and Horoscope, all you have to do is simply think of a question in one of the following areas of your life and get it answered via psychic reading instantly. 

Categories to choose from include:
* Daily Horoscope 
* Celtic Cross,Tree Of Life 
* Meanings of all the cards
* Your Wish Will Be Fulfilled Or Not? 
* Life, Love, Relationships, Health, Money, Family, Friends
* Dreams, Ambitions, Travel, Work and Career
* Focus, Success, Luck, Marriage, Emotional and Mental State
* Marriage, Past Life, Keys of your Life, get help making a decision, yes or no
* Birthday Reading (How will your coming year be?)
* Monthly Reading (Detailed 5 card reading) 
* Will your wish be fulfilled or not?
* 2020 Reading (Detailed 5 card reading) 

FEATURES OF TAROT CARD READING AND TAROT HOROSCOPE ARE:
- Get Free Psychic Reading 
- You can enjoy the app offline
- The Card Readings available include 1 card, 3 cards, 4 cards, 5 cards, 7 cards,10 cards
- It uses all 78 cards including 22 Major Arcana and 56 Minor Arcana, based on the Rider-Waite deck
- There is an option to shuffle the cards if you wish

Use the Tarot Card reading and Horoscope app to get instant answers to your questions through psychic reading!

The app content is based on general information about the topics and provides reading accordingly. They are tailored to traits of a large number of people which share similar birth details. The text has been written based on general assumptions and must not be used as personalized readings to take decisions in life but rather more of a guidance and entertainment tool.

comments: I read tarot but don't always have the cards with me. The cards are accurate in their placement and as long as the person reading has their own context clues, the reading will be quite good. And the more I use this app, the more I appreciate all its features. Try out some of these different paths. I love the different spreads and will probably add some of then to what I do now. Even the ads are not intrusive. Very manageable. I am very grateful for this app.

I love it. Fun, interesting & spot on with most of it. As it goes... "Tarot never lies". Its amazing how accurate these are. Give it a try, you have nothing to lose. Hope it works as well for others as it does me & people around me who try it from my phone. Mind blowing! Take what you read on the light side, not too serious. Its great.

This app has so far been good. I don't have any problem using it every day üòÖ. Nevertheless, I would urge the creator to add one more special feature about moon & sun signs astrologyüò≠, besides having the horoscope section. üòéüòá It will also better the app.

That was actually spot on. I'm new to tarot but catching on quick. I have had paranormal experiences my entire life. Have seen 6 UFOs. Dreams I remember having, that give me deja vu, witch always have to do with future events in my life and are almost exactly the same. Plus I'm pretty good at predicting cards with shapes. Not sure what all that means and have been searching for answers my entire life. Tarot makes a lot of sense to me and so far it's been a positive tool in my life.

First use was soooo accurate. I was able to connect with two friends spiritually and that's exactly what it read. Also, it said If I start a new business soon, I can accomplish it. Weirdd because I've been debating since last year and just these past few months about starting my own...

title: Photo Lock App - Hide Pictures & Videos
description:
Photo Lock App is completely free to hide unlimited photos and videos. Do you want your personal life really personal? Keep Secret your gallery and No need to worry when giving your smart phone to friends and family when Photo Lock app installed in your phone.

Top Features

‚òÜ Hide Pictures & Videos: Your files will be secretly stored and can only be viewed in this app after a numeric PIN or Pattern is entered.

‚òÜ Safe Browser:  Surf through internet using safe browser and even download photos and videos which will be stored secretly inside this app. You can even bookmark your favorite sites to access them easily.

‚òÜ App Lock: Powerful App Lock system to lock private and social apps along with Fingerprint AppLock option for compatible devices.


Advance Features

‚ñ∫ Share to Hide
You can directly hide pictures and videos from phone gallery or SD card by sharing to Photo Lock app.

‚ñ∫ Fake Vault
Create Fake vault with different password for storing fake photos and videos.

‚ñ∫ Stealth Mode (Replace app icon)
Photo Lock app icon magically disappears and gets replaced with a secret icon e.g. News, weather, radio, etc. You can also start this app without icon from your phone's Settings/Apps/Photo Lock/MANAGE SPACE.

‚ñ∫ Face Down Lock
The app will perform action given by you when your device faces downward. You can choose to close the app or open a website or other app in emergency.

‚ñ∫ Fake Cover
Disguise your apps lock screen to prevent from breaking into your password. Fingerprint scanner and fake force close dialog will hide the real lock screen.

‚ñ∫ Intruder Selfie
Automatically takes Intruder selfie when someone tries to break in your privacy by entering wrong password or pattern.

‚ñ∫ Inbuilt Image Viewer and Video Player
Support Inbuilt Image Viewer to view pictures and slideshow them with transition effects.
Support Inbuilt Video Player to play videos with any media player installed in your phone.

‚ñ∫ Uninstall Protection
Prevents Photo Lock app from being uninstalled from kids or strangers.
This app uses the Device Administrator permission.

This app uses Accessibility Service.

Quick Tips
‚úî In order to Change PIN quickly go to Settings tab and click on Change Password.
‚úî After you Hide Pictures and Videos, Export icon in Photo lock brings back your media whenever needed.
‚úî Easily Change SlideShow interval using the Settings tab.
‚úî Use Theme icon to make the Vault Lock Screen colorful so you don‚Äôt get bored.


---------FAQ--------

Q: If I uninstall the app, can I get my pictures back if I reinstall the app?
A: Re-installing cannot recover those deleted files. So please make sure to unhide and backup all your hidden files before uninstalling this app.

Q: What about if I lost my phone or broken?
A: Your files are stored only on your device and not online.

Q: Can I take out my media from this photo and video Locker?
A: Yes, you can easily export photos and videos using couple of steps

Q: Photos and videos are stored together or separately?
A: You can hide photos in photo locker and videos in videos locker inside this app.

Q: If I forgot my password?
A: If you Forget Password you can always Recover Password by your registered e-mail id and regain access to this app by click on forgot password option on lock pad

Need Help?
Feel free to mail us at: donnadanley247@gmail.com

descriptionHTML:
THE MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME ON GOOGLE PLAY!

Join the mysterious Order of The Secret Society, browse a multitude of free hidden object games and explore numerous enchanting worlds!

The Secret Society¬Æ is a clandestine community of people with the unique ability to move through magic worlds, find hidden treasures and play mystery puzzle games. Your dear Uncle Richard, an elite member of this ancient Order, has suddenly gone missing. After a period of despair, you realize that you too are blessed with these special powers and thus the only one that can find him! Go on a mystery adventure, browse thousands of hidden objects games and quests, locate your beloved uncle, protect the sacred Artifact of the Order and thwart the forces threatening the entire society in this fantastic game of hidden object pictures and puzzles!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

‚óè Over 7200 quests to keep you entertained for months
‚óè 94 amazing locations full of fascinating characters
‚óè 1100+ collections of hidden objects to piece together
‚óè Gem Match mini-game: swap and match gems to get three in a row!
‚óè Ingenious mini-games and puzzles wrapped in a hidden objects mystery
‚óè Regular updates with additional quests to find hidden objects and more
‚óè One of the best hidden object mystery games on the store
‚óè Google Play game services support
______________________________

Compatibility notes: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.

summary: Find hidden objects, collect hidden pictures and master mystery puzzle games!
developerAddress: Birger Jarlsgatan 18, Stockholm 114 34, Sweden
recentChanges:
üê™NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE ‚Äì A magical photo of an Oasis has revealed a strange package from Uncle Richard that was hidden in an ancient pyramid. Travel to Egypt to become an archaeologist, but hurry: the pyramid's entrance opens only in November!
üéÅDESERT TREASURE EVENT ‚Äì Complete 30+ quests and five collections to get Avatars, a Queen's Gift Talisman, a Pharaoh's Amulet Artifact and more. Also, enjoy lots of everyday gifts!
üîéMORE QUESTS & COLLECTIONS ‚Äì Tackle 60+ quests and 10 collections.
comments: I love games that challenge me and having fun while doing it cant get any better. The only thing I would like to really see them change in the game is being able to sale or discard the build up of all the unusable items that's wracked up during the game when we have to play boards again and again to get the full in items to complete a collection. It's a waste of space and gets ugly seeing all those collections needing to be filled but it's one's you've filled again and again going no where.

I like most of this game to pass the time, but honestly the gem match portion is ridiculous. If you are going to require it to get certain elements at least make it possible. The mechanics are absurdly clunky and slow and the colors make it difficult to see the blues and greens. Please consider updating, it is ruining the rest of the game. The hidden object and other puzzles are good.

The game is good, but the friends part is poorly organized and difficult. Gifting collection items is so difficult, it's almost no fun to do. Collectibles should be organized by quantity. I only gift items that I have more than one of. Having to scroll through EVERYTHING to find my multiples takes FOREVER. No fun!

Been playing this game for over 5 years. I don't play it all the time so I do save up a lot of energy to play special events, that's what I play the most. I just get frustrated now always having to play gem match as that is my least favorite puzzle. Please consider switching them up like you used to. Also it would be nice if you could accept all gifts at once from friends like before the friends section changed to what it is now. Also having the option to block invites would be appreciated.

I love this game but a couple improvements could be made like when you visit another player's game you have to go back home before you can visit another 1. There should be a way to go from 1 player's game to another right from where you are. Unless there already is & I just can't find it. Also the match 3 moves like molasses & I feel that I've lost just becoz of that & the fact that you can't do anything until all the pieces have come to a full stop. That's a little unfair I think.

title: Stop - Categories Word Game
description:
Stop is a fun and clever turn based game you play with friends. 

Randomly select a letter to start and type a word for each of the 5 different categories that starts with that letter. The player that gets most correct words in the least amount of time wins!


Features:

- Turn based, fast paced word game
- Go head to head with your friends on Facebook and Game Center
- Unlimited fun with challenging categories to choose from
- Achievements to unlock and conquer the game
- Learn a new language! Play in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese

Start playing Stop!

Tune in at www.facebook.com/stopbyfanatee

recentChanges:
- Bug fixes

--
Thanks everyone for the feedback!
Team Fanatee
comments: Only 3 stars because I quite enjoy the game, there are alot of ads which I can deal with however you dont get enough lives so you're basically waiting and hoping that the other player hasnt put their phone down so you can play for longer than 5 minutes. My suggestion is either add more lives, or cut down the time to wait for lives. If its going to be a half hour wait to get 1 life, it's not worth my time when I use all 3 in 5-10 minutes.

This is a super great innovative game. I love it. I have always loved the paper version, but to find an app version, this is great. Thank you developers and all who worked hard to make this app possible- From the little guys who are hardly recognized to the CEO or whatever you call your top people.

The game itself is fun! It would be great to have a way to leave comments to your opponent. Some people leave hilarious answers. But the ads are offensive and obnoxious. I understand the need to have ads to support the business, and that I could just pay $3 to remove them. Just beware if your kids want to download it, some of the ads are Rated R.

I REALLY love this game. It's super fast paced, makes me think and I really enjoy the premise of it. However the ads are absolutely terrible. They are constant and long and I know I will soon stop playing the game because of it
The game is fun but very repetitive but it's whatever. I hate how many ads there are and the amount of time they need to run before you can exit out from them.

title: FRAG Pro Shooter
description:
Get ready to discover FRAG PRO SHOOTER, a free shooter game by Oh BiBi! Play explosive 1v1 duels against players from all over the world with this amazing FPS designed for your phone. 

BECOME A TOP FRAG SHOOTER!
- Join more than 50 million players worldwide.
- Meet other players for short but crazy battles!
- Control your character in first person or third person views.
- Discover the new co-op mode! Cooperate with another player to defeat your opponents!

PERSONALIZE YOUR GAMEPLAY FOR 1v1 MATCHES
- Switch between your 5 characters and gain the advantage!
- Being dead isn't that bad: regain life instantly with another character!
- Build your battle team to fit your game style: attack, defense, etc...

CREATE YOUR OWN TEAM
- Over 80 characters for building your dream team and becoming the best shooter.
- Customize your characters with powerful and exciting skins!
- Upgrade your characters to make them even more awesome!

MAKE FRIENDS, RIVALS, AND BECOME A SUPERSTAR!!
- Expand your FAN BASE to become popular!!
- Join a club or create your own to make your team famous!
- Record and share your games and decks, and check out others‚Äô to become better!

TIPS
- Every character has their strengths and weaknesses: try them all to see which ones are best for you!
- Attack the enemy target to get lots of points, but beware of ambushes!
- Check your missions for amazing rewards!

FRAG PRO SHOOTER is a match for any rival PC or console game. It has everything a shooter needs: FPS (first person shooter) and TPS (third person shooter) options, auto shoot, and all the controls are adjustable to fit your playing style! It‚Äôs no secret that FRAG PRO SHOOTER has more than 50 million players, so come join the fun!

16 rue d'Ath√®nes
