comments: Loved the app. I can see the articles in this app slowly impacting my daily routine. It's keeping me motivated. It's helping me learn things. I feel like reading a good book after just a small article. Thing to improve: it suggests me a good article in the notification and when I click it nothing happens. The notification just disappears.

This is an amazing app!!!!I am writing my review after one month of using it and the app gives me some inspirational ideas and strategies to make my lifestyle better in a progressive manner.However, I am giving 4 stars because of the bugs.When I open the app,it freezes for a few minutes and works.I hope it can be rectified on upcoming updates. EDIT : Thanks for the response from the team! It just works fine now . Reinstall fixed the bugs. I already had the latest 4.3.0 and it had bugs somehow..

Instead of swiping to read the next article, may I suggest putting an icon that we can tap on to go to the next article instead of swiping? when scrolling on the current article that I'm reading, I accidentally scroll too far to the left/right and it goes to the next article and when I go back, it didn't even refresh to where I left off! I love this app, I prefer it more than social media, but it's so annoying when I accidentally swipe on the next article and have to go back & scroll down again!

In a world that seems to be a raging dumpster fire, and everything in social media and news pointing to how bad things are getting... This app is a breath of fresh air. It offers simple, memorable morsels of wisdom. Easily consumable. It is so important to focus on what we can control---ourselves. Working on bettering ourselves, our mindsets, and expanding our horizons is the way we change the world. I am adding this app to my home screen and making a commitment to read articles daily. Great app

This is just so worth it. If I were to recommend something that is worth accessing, well this is pretty much on my top list of reads. I'm loving this, the settings, the articles in it and the concepts of developing such an app was so just so impressive. Hats off to the developers and creators.

title: Smart Recorder ‚Äì High-quality voice recorder
description:
Free and easy to use audio recorder for Android. It has been specifically designed for high-quality and long-time recording with a clean and simple user interface.

With a skipping silence on-the-fly feature you can shorten recordings by omitting relative silence. It allows you, for example, to catch night sleep talks or maybe some snoring, whatever comes first. üò¥ It is by the way how the idea to make this app was born: my wife wanted to prove that I talk at night. It turns out, I do. ü§î

Since 2012 this app has been installed on more than 40 million devices worldwide and proven to be a reliable everyday tool. From it's early days it has been known as Smart Voice Recorder, rebranded later to a bit more generic name. Because, you know, it's great not only for voice. üé∏

Regarding phone calls: üì≤
This app is not designed explicitly for recording phone calls. Some manufacturers block the ability to record the other party of a phone call for privacy or legal reasons. For the same purpose, the app will even pause the recording during phone calls, but it can be turned off in the settings. Check your local laws and make sure it works on your handset first.

More features:
‚Ä¢  Automatic and manual sensitivity control for Skip silence mode (Beta)
‚Ä¢  Live audio spectrum analyzer
‚Ä¢  Wave/PCM encoding with adjustable sample rate (8-44 kHz)
‚Ä¢  Recording in the background (even when a display is off)
‚Ä¢  Save/pause/resume/cancel recording process control
‚Ä¢  Efficient and easy on battery
‚Ä¢  Recording time limited only by available space on your storage (and tech. limit 2GB per file)
‚Ä¢  Straightforward recordings list and many sharing options
‚Ä¢  Launcher shortcut to start recording in one tap
‚Ä¢  Microphone gain calibration tool.

comments: This is the best app of its kind. I go into the settings to manually set the skip silence and I have the best experience for multiple projects. I use this for music, capturing dreams when I wake up, recording important conversations, and sorting out ideas. I've downloaded this on multiple phones, I just wish there was an apple version of it.

It's Great! Does what it says it'll do and so far and especially with as much as I use it, no crashes, glitches or stall outs, (which used to happen a couple of years ago with older version of both app and phone). I've always re-downloaded this app specifically because of its definitive reliability for all that I need it for. It's also a definite 'must have' for interviews, appointments, sessions, and lectures whenever needed. (Only thing I might ask is for more updates playback options) Thanks

Great, simple app that opens quickly, is easy to navigate, and does exactly what it proposes to do and nothing more. When a native recorder was added to Android recently I considered switching to it, but it has a fatal flaw: it's difficult to get your recordings out of it. This app records things to a well-known place that it shows you via its settings.

I've been using this app for a few years now to record song ideas and stuff and they finally asked me to rate it so I decided hell yeah why not this app is a free high-quality recorder and has helped me out immensely and they don't constantly bombard with ads and and ask you to rate all the time I noticed this was the first time they asked maybe they just do that now but anyway I said "let's do it." Hope u like that sentence. üòé This is my primary recording app and I prefer it over the others.

Why all the high ratings for this I just ran the app and tested the recording quality of talking with my phone locked and my phone was directly next to me and all I got was muffled inaudible garbage. Perhaps it is good for speaking directly into the mic recording but if you need to record a class or something with your phone closed it seems this isn't the app for it. I had high hopes for this app back to the drawing board.

title: Cara Menyembuhkan Mata Juling Dengan Alami
description:
Mata juling atau strabismus* merupakan kondisi dimana kedua mata
tidak bergerak ke arah yang sama dan terlihat bergerak kearah yang
berbeda. Salah satu atau kedua mata dapat mengarah ke dalam atau keluar.
Mata yang lemah menjadi lebih malas atau jarang digunakan, sebab otak
menggunaan sinyal dari mata yang lebih kuat. Mata juling umumnya terjadi
pada anak-anak, namun dapat terjadi pada masa dewasa. Pada orang dewasa
mata juling dapat disebabkan karena /diabetes, stroke atau cedera mata./

title: Among Us
description:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship. 

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
descriptionHTML:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
summary: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal!
developerAddress:
PO Box 2532
Redmond, WA 98073
recentChanges: * Add support for 6 digit room codes.
comments: This is a very fun and addicting game, I love all of the features but I would recommend to add some features like:- 1. Creating an account and having the same name, but you can change it anytime you want, so by having an account we can add friends. 2. Add a voice feature for more fun, but still the chat feature should be there for people uncomfortable to talk. 3. Changing the amount of impostors and changing the map while being in the lobby as people misclick usually. I hope you can add this.

Great game. Has clearly grown in popularity since lockdown: almost everyone i know is playing it! I have a few improvements though that may make the game more enjoyable for people (like me) who cant spend money in games. One thing i would suggest is adding 'achievements', so that players can unlock some pets, skins, etc. Of course, you could also buy them with real money, but this gives people a chance to earn them instead of buying them. Also, seasonal kill animations would be cool. (Xmas, etc)

I honestly didn't get the point of it all, until I played it. The game is great! And as an app is even better! Getting used to the controls takes a bit of time, but it's surprisingly user friendly. My only problem so far has been with the keyboard (it blocks the entire screen and is really slow, but only ingame) and how other apps, specifically Messenger, can't display over it.

Very fun and addictive game!! However there are a few bugs and tips I could give. For me there is a glitch as the imposter where someone will report a body or call a meeting, but, I will hear the chat going off but im still playing the game, and everyone is frozen. Idk if that has happend to anyone else but if you could fix that that would be great! And also being a ghost is kind of boring. If you could give the ghost some extra things to do that would also be great. Other that that great game!

The game is amazing. Love the simplicity of the game, very enjoyable when playing with friends. Which brings up the topic of a friend system, sometimes it's hard to gather close friends. You can often meet some great people in lobbies, but the only problem is you cannot add them to play in the future which is a shame because this can definitely keep the community growing/make players stay. Love the game none the less. (Also hoping to see more add ons/maps in the future!!)

title: Photo Studio
description:
Photo Studio is a powerful multifunctional photo editing application for photographers of any level. It contains the vast editing kit of tools for basic and advanced retouching of your photos. Make each your shot a perfect complete art-work using a wide range of effects, filters, text editing and color enhancement tools and a lot of other ready-to-use features.

Main features:

1. More than 200 unique filters, amazing special effects, a big collection of picture-in-picture effects, rich set of various frames for any event of your life, huge amount of stickers, textures, shapes and correction tools ‚Äì lighting tune, color correction, sharpening, lens boost, tilt shift, blur and more.

2. Use manual correction tools to highlight, fix or improve any part or object on your photo. Use mask correction tool to apply filters, effects or tune your photo selectively.

3. Collage editor allows to combine several photos into amazingly looking photo collages with a wide variety of adjustable frames, shapes, customizable backgrounds, templates and stickers.

4. Magic tools comprising the following outstanding features:¬† Blend feature for combining of two images together using a big collection of masks, backgrounds and blend modes; Color Splash is aimed to highlight objects on a photo; Clone stamp is intended to copy objects, change or erase a background; Shapes editor helps to combine photos with multiple variations of shapes, textures and backgrounds. 

5. Impressive text editing tool is designed for creation of nice-looking messages on your photos with rich collection of customizable fonts, color, textures and shapes.

6. About 50 additional content packages expanding the photo editing process with new effects, frames, textures, fonts and templates. Our team's constantly working hard to implement new stunning features to gain the #1 photo editor title.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/kvadgroup
Twitter: http://twitter.com/kvadgroup

comments: I really like this editing app. It has lots of features and I have found it mostly easy to use. I have used other editing apps but always come back to this one. It would be a great feature in this app to be able to save, search, or favorite certain presets... like the preset texts. Overall, Great App. Good job. Plus, thanks for all the cool things available with this app for free.

This app is really easy to use, and has a lot of options to choose from when editing photos from various filters, to effects. There are so many things to do with this app, even with the free version. The only issue I have is sometimes a picture will become pixelated however majority of the time, the outcome is great. Definitely my favorite photo editing app

You can do alot of customisation and there are presets available for free which are enough to get you going, you can make realy nice edits with what's there you just need to get creative with it. and there aren't any ad pop-ups, insted they're on the side of your editor and don't get in the way of anything which is great. But most importantly you get full detail on the type of image you want to export and it gets saved in high quality. This is the best editor for free and highly recommend it!

App keeps crashing I have been using this app for a long time now, have had problems in the past but now it keeps crashing as soon as it's opens. So I uninstalled it and downloaded it again and it still keeps in crashing. I have purchased a LOT of effects, so I really need this to work. I gave 1 star because of this problem, if you can get this working for me I will upgrade the rating.

Bestest ever... Amazing app with ennumber of filters & effects. I've been using it for 3 years now and I love it! my all time favorite app. Easy to use and very impressive and the great part is that its almost add free. I strongly recommend it to everyone.

title: AT&T Smart Wi-Fi
description:
AT&T Smart Wi-Fi connection manager is a free app that finds and auto-connects to available hotspots, logs missed hotspot opportunities for your review and action for later use, and displays your real-time cellular and Wi-Fi data usage.

Let this app help to increase your Wi-Fi connections while minimizing your cellular data consumption. AT&T Smart Wi-Fi helps you find, auto-connect and remember available hotspots in places you frequent. This free app also displays your Wi-Fi and cellular data usage in real-time so you can keep tabs on your data plan usage. Running quietly in the background, AT&T Smart Wi-Fi uses hotspot auto-detection to make it easy for you to discover, select and build a list of available hotspots. Additionally, AT&T Smart Wi-Fi creates a hotspot opportunity list by logging and mapping hotspots you‚Äôve seen -- but not connected to previously. By doing this, you can be notified of relevant hotspots the next time you‚Äôre in that area in order to connect.

AT&T Smart Wi-Fi uses accessibility services.
